Banner

We now offer banner design as a package for our dealers. We need a banner template designed which will be used for our Toyota dealers, for all of their models. Please design a banner to the following pixel dimensions 880x320 using the attached RAV4 and the following information:

  • NEW 2013 RAV4 4x4 LE
  • $0 Down
  • $259 Per Month
  • Disclaimer: Prices plus tax, title, freight, and $489 processing fee. Lease: 36 month, 12,000 mile per year. No security deposity.
  • Button: View Inventory

Header

We are often asked to redesign headers for our clients. We mock them up first and later convert them to HTML files. Using the "header" file and images downloaded via link below, please convert this jpg file to HTML using 1 external stylesheet.

File Submission

  1. Place the files in a .zip folder with the following naming scheme "dealeron_designer-firstName_lastName".
  2. Reply to the email you received from us.
